appendix.title: Documentation Updates
appendix.para: This chapter lists content changes for this document since the release of &productnamereg; 2.0.
This manual was updated on the following dates:

listitem.para: In , corrected the name of an example &o_comp; configuration file for custom settings ().
In , updated the entries of a drop-down box ().
Numerous small fixes and corrections throughout the document (, ).
Corrected procedure for adding external networks (doc comment #34001).
Removed remaining entries for &hyper; (doc comment #34976).
Added .
Added new manuals on &productname; Monitoring (&o_monitor;) to the list of available documentation in the introduction ().
Added documentation for &productname; Monitoring (&o_monitor;) to various chapters in this guide.
Updated "Important: VLAN Settings" info boxes to correct conflicting information ().
Corrected several instances of teaming to team ().

Moved the "Recovering Clusters to a Healthy State" appendix to
().

Added new section documenting network-json-resolve in
().
Changed my_mode, which is not a valid network mode, to valid network modes in the network.json configuration examples ().

Added more supported network interface speeds to
().

Corrected section on creating multiple external networks
().

Added section on configuring SSL for RabbitMQ
().

Expanded information about Glance image caching
().

Corrected section on &o_blockstore; NFS backend mount options
().
Make Aodh HA ().
Document hawk-server default login and password ().
Document new multiple-domain auth/identity back-end for Keystone ().

Corrected number of nodes required for Ceilometer HA in
().
Updated the web-based upgrade procedure (, , , , , , , , , , , , , , ).
Added .
Reorganized the structure of the guide by integrating most of the appendices into the main parts of the guide.
Made corrections to the definition and examples in . ()

Provided information for changing the default client network in
().

Added more information about certificates to
().
The cinder-volume role can now also be deployed to a cluster. Added a note to on how to re-deploy this role from a single machine to a cluster environment ().
The ec2-api role can now also be deployed to a cluster. Added information about the deployment of ec2-api and nova-controller to .
Added ().
Rewrote to reflect the new upgrade procedure.
&ceph; needs to be upgraded separately ().
Added an explanatory note for the SSL CA Certificates File field ().
All nodes including the &admserv; are now based on &cloudos;. &blockstore; now supports &storage; 4.
The documentation has been updated accordingly.
Removed all references to Nova-docker and &hyper; ().
Numerous small fixes and additions to the documentation, based on technical feedback.
All screenshots have been updated to reflect UI changes.
The e-mail address for documentation feedback has changed to doc-team@suse.com.
Adjusted the RAM requirements for all nodes managed by &crow; ().
The &inst_crow; can only be started via the &wi;—using install-suse-cloud is deprecated ().
Added ().
Updated ().
Added more information to about the ceph-mds role ().

Added to
().

Added to
().

Added to
().
Added ().
Added ().
Added How to change the &o_ident; credentials after the &o_ident; &barcl; has been deployed? ().
Added ().
Moved from to . Restructured the section.
A virtualized &admserv; is supported ().

Added software defined networks (SDN) to network graphics in
().

In , added
().
In , updated information on licenses and subscriptions ().
Added note to clarify the use of an ⪪ server on the &admserv; ().
In , added more specific hardware requirements in case &ceph; is used as storage.

Integrated more information on network bonding mode into
().
Updated ().
In , warned about automatic changes to the cluster ().

Corrected the command for reinstalling the &susemgr; &barcl; in
().

In , rephrased note on proposal names and added link to
().
In , added how to find and specify the watchdog kernel module. It is needed for using SBD as a fencing mechanism for shared storage ().
The &o_ident; algorithm default changed from PKI to UUID for security reasons. The changes have been applied to ().

Added a general tip on multiple &rgw; nodes setup in
().
In , recommended dedicated nodes for each &ceph; component and allowed for self-signed SSL certificates for &rgw;.
Added ().

Added &o_objstore; as a storage back-end for &o_img; in
().

Added a tip about shared storage in
().
In , added a note on how to set large &o_dash; timeouts to ().
Added ().
Added ().
In , added in which order to start and stop storage-related nodes and services ().
Added an explanation for the blue dot status indicator (state upgrade) to ().
In , added another requirement for the upgrade process ().
Fixed syntax of /etc/crowbar/network.json examples in and added the TX/RX offloading options ().
Correction for : Bonding supports more than two interfaces ().
Rewrote the interface identifier part in for more clarity ().

Corrected the clean-up command in
().
Added ().

Hawk uses HTTPS rather than HTTP. Fixed URL accordingly in
().

Fixed a self-referencing link in
().
Corrected the description of the status indicators on the node dashboard in ().
Renamed SUSE Cloud to SUSE OpenStack Cloud.
Reorganized the manual by introducing parts and splitting long chapters to improve readability.
All nodes including the &admserv; are now based on &cloudos;. The documentation has been updated accordingly.
Rewrote large parts of because repository handling in &productname; has been made easier. Furthermore, repositories are no longer provided by the Novell Customer Center, but rather by the &scc;.
Added .
Added documentation for the new &wi;-based installation of the &admserv;.
A new backup procedure has been added to &productname; ().
is now done via a &wi;.
Added .

Added 'Recovering Clusters to a Healthy State' appendix.
. (Moved to Maintenance chapter 2017-05-24)
&productname; 6 supports &o_sharefs; a &sharefs; ().
Added

Added how to change the &crow; password in
().

Updated repository links and paths in
(, , and ).

Provided a full list of &ostack; roles and services in
().
&productname; does not support &ha; for the LBaaS service plug-in ().
Provided instructions on how to change keymap on &compnode;s ().

Added a link to the &storage; documentation to
().
An &hasetup; for &o_dbaas; is not supported ().
Added the new section . ().
Repositories are distributed by the &scc; ().

Updates on adding an external &ceph; cluster at
( and ).

Added documentation for VXLAN support at
().
HA cluster nodes need to be put into maintenance mode prior to updating packages ().

Added an explanation on Distributed Virtual Routers (DVR) to
().
New technology preview feature: Docker support ().

Added instructions on how to disable PXE and DNS services on the &admserv; to allow custom provisioning at
( and ).

Added instructions on how to enable jumbo frames at
().
Added the new appendix ().

Added instructions on how to install additional packages to
().
Public and floating networks can be split using different VLANs ().
Calamari needs to be deployed on a dedicated node ().
Setting REPOS_SKIP_CHECKS is no longer needed on &productname; 6 ().

Provided better examples for /etc/crowbar/network.json in
().
Added a solution for fixing nodes in state Problem at ().
The openvswitch with VLAN configuration for neutron-l3 no longer requires a 4 NIC configuration ().

Added documentation for the Cisco UCS support at
().
Added the FAQ ().
&productname; 6 supports &o_sharefs; a &sharefs; ().
Errors in have been fixed ().
Renamed SUSE Cloud to SUSE OpenStack Cloud ().
Updates for the &swift; &barcl; ().
Updates for the &o_img; &barcl; ().
Updates for the &o_blockstore; &barcl; ().
Updates for the &o_netw; &barcl; ().
Updates for the &o_comp; &barcl; ().
OpenAIS has been replaced by Corosync ().
Updates for the list of services at ().
Updates for the &o_meter; &barcl; ().
Updates for ().
Updated ().
Minor changes in ().
Services on &cloudos; are started via the systemctl command ().

New attributes for the
().

Document the possibility to set the node file system at
().
Horizon SSL options do not match ().
The new backup procedure has been documented at . ().
Added documentation about deploying HA for &compnode;s ().

Added 'Recovering Clusters to a Healthy State' appendix.
. (Moved to Maintenance chapter 2017-05-24) ().
Added ().
Provided additional information on bonding modes at (doc comment #29562).
An &hasetup; of &o_meter; needs to be installed on a cluster with an odd number of nodes (Doc Comment 26861).
Completely rewrote . Added information about subscriptions, optional features, media layout and repositories.
Split the chapter into two separate parts.
Transferred the optional ⪪ installation to the appendix () to improve the readability.
Added information about &slsa; 12 and &storage; repositories and adjusted the repository paths to the new structure.
Removed information about linking to local ⪪ repositories— this is now done automatically by the installation script.
Completely rewrote to make it easier to read.
Updated screenshots where necessary.
Updated because of new configuration options, roles and the fact that &ceph; needs &slsa; 12 nodes.
Updated by adding instructions on how to deploy multiple back-ends. Also added descriptions for additional back-ends Fujitsu ETERNUS DX and &vmware;.
Updated because of changes in the &barcl;.
Added .
Added .
Added How to change the default keymap for &vmguest;s?.
Added &vmware; &compnode; system requirements to .
Added .
Added .

Added a warning about old database files on shared storage to
().

Added information about log files written during the upgrade procedure to and
().
Added ().
Fixed deployment order of &barcl;s ().

Fixed wrong group names and file names in
().
Fixed various minor issues in chapters and ().
Updated by adding instructions on how to deploy multiple back-ends. Also added descriptions for additional back-ends Fujitsu EXTERNUS DX and &vmware; ().

Added a pointer to man mount(8) to
().

Documented the Region Name at
().

Added &vmware; &compnode; system requirements to
().
crowbar-backup () is now officially supported by &suse; ().
The &yast; Crowbar module now supports adding custom repositories, which no longer makes it necessary to manually edit /etc/crowbar/provisioner.js (>).
Added How to change the default keymap for &vmguest;s? ().
Corrected the number of nodes required for deploying Ceph-mon ().
Added installation details for an HA database setup using a shared NFS directory to ().

Added a link to the CinderSupportMatrix in
().
Added ().
Updated ().
Updated ().
Documented changes in regarding the NetApp back-end ().
Added ().
Added ().

Corrected the SBD setup description in
().

Added information on &ceph; Calamari to
().

Added information about &ceph; requiring &slsa; 12 nodes (,
and ).

Added the section
().
Updated the &barcl; descriptions where necessary.
Updated screenshots where necessary.
Added the section ().

Added an explanation for the new option Policy when cluster does not have quorum to
().
Added a list of &o_netw; plugins which can be used with &vmware; ().

Added the section
().
Added an annotation to explaining why not to use symbolic links for the &sls; product repository ().

Added an explanation explaining the need to use a sub-domain in
().
Added the section ().

Cleaned up network ranges in
().
Corrected annotation on VLAN settings ().
Fixed an error about using openvswitch with Windows server integration in ().

Updated the upgrade procedure in
().

sect1.title: April 21, 2014 (Maintenance Release SUSE Cloud 3)
sect1.para: Included information on how to make SUSE Cloud highly available.
The following new sections have been added:
Various smaller additions and changes throughout the document. New terms have been added to .

listitem.para: Re-wrote because &yast; now supports &crow; user management, setting up a bastion network and configuring external repository URLs.
Added the section .
Added the section .
Added the FAQ How to change the default disk used for operating system installation? to .
Updated .
Lots of minor changes in because of changes in the Web interface.
Added .
Added .
Added instructions on how to use the Cisco Nexus plugin with &o_netw; (.
Added instructions on how to configure NetApp for &o_blockstore; to .
Updated all screenshots because of an updated Web interface theme.
Added the section .
Added .
Added definition of user roles to .
Added a notes on the VLAN configuration at various places ( and ).

Adjusted the memory recommendations for the &contrnode;(s) at
().
Updated ().
Added ().
Corrections in ().
Corrected network name in the SUSE Cloud Network Overview image in ().

Added instructions on how to disable route verification to
().
Screenshots for node allocation and for all &barcl;s have been added to and .

Added the FAQ What to do when install-suse-cloud fails on deploying the IPMI/BMC network? to
().

Completely restructured the FAQ section in
().

Added a note about VLANs on the admin network to
().
Re-wrote Setting Up a Bastion Network.
Completely re-wrote the repositories chapter. It now also contains information on how to use an external SMT or &susemgr; server.
Renamed the commands smt repos and smt mirror to smt-repos and smt-mirror because of a conflict with the smt command from the star package ().
Added a section on how to adjust the &cloud; network settings ().
Added a snippet on the os_sdn network, that was introduced in SUSE Cloud 2.0 ().
Added .
Added .
Added .
Re-wrote .
Added information on the new Public Name and Target Platform attributes on the Node Dashboard to .
Added instructions on how to deploy &o_netw; ().
Added instructions on how to set up support for &vmware; ESX ().
Added instructions on how to deploy &o_blockstore; in .
&barcl; descriptions have been updated—almost all configurable attributes are now described in .
Added a note on debugging and adding additional repositories the update repositories chapter ().
Clarified in that cinder-volume can be deployed on several block storage nodes ().

Added the role name for the &admserv; to
(

Added information on how to access nodes from the outside by using the &admserv; as a jump host via the bastion network in
().
Added a short description on how to change the host name during the installation in the section ().
Dropped snippets about how to activate the bastion network ().

Fixed a syntax error in a program listing at
().

Added the FAQ I have installed a new hard disk on a node that was already deployed. Why is it ignored by Crowbar? to
().
Added the FAQ What to do if a node hangs during hardware discovery after the very first boot using PXE into the SLEShammer image? to ().
Corrected the IP address in ().
Made various improvements throughout the document ()
